quote.name: Amandine “Cryptie” (Privacy Specialist), France
quote.text: I am Cryptie, I am living in Paris, France. I used to be a cryptographer and now I am a privacy specialist. I consciously use Free Software for 15 years now. I discovered the FSFE randomly, I found the FSFE website and just loved this idea of counter-lobbying. I am a supporter of the FSFE for already 6 years now.
